str2: (a) indeed, really, (b) yet, however, nevertheless. From Not Used and toi; indeed though, i.e. However.
In like manner, similarly, in the same way, equally. Adverb from homoios; similarly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To dream (see visions) in my sleep. Middle voice from enupnion; to dream.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To stain, pollute, defile, corrupt. Perhaps a primary verb; to sully or taint, i.e. Contaminate.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a compound of a and a derivative of tithemi; to set aside, i.e. to disesteem, neutralize or violate.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
